metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40401 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the RS-274X aperture definitiontokenization functionality of Gerbv 2.7.0 and dev (commit b5f1eacd) andGerbv forked 2.7.1. A specially-crafted gerber file can lead to codeexecution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger thisvulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40401` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gerbv - 2.8.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gerbv package in esm-apps/jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.8.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
